pullrequest.title: Improve steering behavior of example tracked vehicle

content.raw:
Thanks for checking, @{iche033} . There's something different about my setup then. I just can't imagine what could it be. I have DART from debs and the latest `ign-physics1` from source. I get an RTF around 37~45%.

I'm fine merging this, but let's keep an eye on these differences in case something else starts showing up too.
content.html:
Thanks for checking, @Ian Chen . There's something different about my setup then. I just can't imagine what could it be. I have DART from debs and the latest ign-physics1 from source. I get an RTF around 37~45%.

I'm fine merging this, but let's keep an eye on these differences in case something else starts showing up too.
